data.eml:eml: Three new species of Helicopsyche von Siebold (Trichoptera: Helicopsychidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Holzenthal, Ralph W., Blahnik, Roger J., Calor, Adolfo R. (2016): Three new species of Helicopsyche von Siebold (Trichoptera: Helicopsychidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4078 (1): 344-353, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4078.1.29
